sentence.Network_en: The weatherman predicted a freeze for tonight.
sentence.Network_cn: 天气预报员预报今晚有冰冻.

sentence.Network_en: The weatherman threw a wet blanket on our picnic plan when he forecast rain.
sentence.Network_cn: 气象员报有雨,给我们的野餐计划泼了冷水.

sentence.Network_en: The weatherman suggested that people not use Highway 7.
sentence.Network_cn: 气象员建议人们不要使用7号公路.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英文单词表_百度知道 ... FARMER 农民 WEATHERMAN 气象员 VETERIANARIAN 兽医.
小学英语必知必会单词_智康1对1 ... neighbour 邻居， weatherman 天气预报员， policeman 男警察，.
三角洲特种部队:极限版_百度百科 ... 2、flood（ 洪水行动） 3、weatherman（ 气象员行动） 1、insurrection( 起义).
新初中英语词汇表 - 祥哥的日志 - 网易博客 ... weather n. 天气 weatherman n. 气象员,预报天气的人 wedding n. 婚礼，结婚.

list.abs: The weatherman suggested that people not use Highway 7 ., 气象员建议人们不要使用 7 号公路.
the weatherman predict shower this afternoon ., 气象预告员说 , 今天下午有阵雨.
don't worry ! the weatherman says we'll have a cold spell before the end of this week .别担心！天气预报员说，在这个周末之前，会有一阵子的冷天气。
The weatherman predicts showers tomorrow ., 气象员预测明天有阵雨.

entry.def: A weatherman is a man who presents weather forecasts at regular times on television or radio.

auth_sentence.content: He has already done a turn as a weatherman.
